thread.title: Pamela/Chicago

author: Pamela/Chicago
title: Pamela/Chicago
text: Received a courteous call from Bennett C (877-505-2324) a few minutes after requesting a free Quote: . He is very patient and thorough in ensuring my travel preferences are met. He has been very responsive in giving an update or answer to my questions from the time he gave trip options, ticketing process and follow-up. Keep up the excellent customer service Bennett!
